Sentence: Harry, a Jewish boy, tells Mick how much he (Mick) hates the Nazis
One day during a wrestling match Mick and Harry suddenly feel attracted to one another, but nothing happens
Mick and Harry Minowitz decide to take a bike trip to a lake to go swimming because the weather has gotten so hot
Harry tells Mick that he (Harry) is going to leave town, but that he (Harry) will write to her (mother) once he (Harry) has found work to make sure she (mother) is doing alright
